entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
